functions.name: animation_export_settings
functions.description: Creates animation export settings.
functions.returns: A dict suitable for use in skeletal_animation_spec's export parameter.

functions.name: animation_keyframe
functions.description: Creates an animation keyframe at a specific time with bone transforms.
functions.returns: A dict suitable for use in skeletal_animation_spec's keyframes list.

functions.name: bone_transform
functions.description: Creates a bone transform with position, rotation, and/or scale.
functions.returns: A dict suitable for use in animation_keyframe's bones map.

functions.name: ik_keyframe
functions.description: Creates an IK keyframe at a specific time with IK target transforms.
functions.returns: A dict for use in IK-based animation.

functions.name: ik_target_transform
functions.description: Creates an IK target transform for IK-driven animation.
functions.returns: A dict suitable for use in IK keyframe targets.

functions.name: skeletal_animation_spec
functions.description: Creates a complete skeletal animation spec with blender_clip_v1 recipe.
functions.returns: A complete spec dict ready for serialization.

functions.name: gradient_node

functions.returns: A dict matching the TextureProceduralNode with Gradient op.

functions.name: grayscale_node

functions.name: invert_node

lint_rules.description: Sample values exceed +/-1.0, causing digital distortion
Non-zero average sample value causes headroom loss and speaker stress
Asset is entirely silent (RMS < -60dB)
Audio loudness is very low
Audio is near clipping levels
Excessive high-frequency energy above 8kHz
Excessive low-mid frequency energy (200-500Hz)
Audio ends abruptly without fade-out
Audio has no spatial effects (reverb, delay)
Short sound effect uses stereo when mono would suffice
Image is entirely black
Image is entirely white
Alpha channel is uniform (all 0 or all 255)
Image has low contrast (narrow value range)
Image shows color banding (too few unique values)
Image has visible seams at tile edges
Image has excessive high-frequency noise
Image has a strong color cast (one channel dominates)
Image dimensions are not power-of-two
Image has large solid regions (>25% identical pixels)
Detects non-manifold edges (edges shared by more than 2 faces)
Detects zero-area triangles (degenerate faces)
Detects vertices with no bone weights in skinned meshes
Detects normals pointing inward (inverted face orientation)
Checks humanoid armature limb proportions against anatomical ranges
Detects overlapping UV islands
Detects high UV distortion (stretch)
Detects faces with no material assigned
Detects excessive use of n-gons (faces with more than 4 vertices)
Detects vertices not used by any face
Warns about high polygon count meshes
Detects meshes without UV coordinates
Pattern has no notes
Note outside MIDI range (0-127)
No patterns in arrangement
Consecutive parallel octaves between voices
Consecutive parallel fifths between voices
Lower voice above higher voice
More than 8 simultaneous notes in a row
Pattern has less than 5% cell occupancy
BPM outside reasonable range (40-300)
Channel has no notes across all patterns
Same pattern repeats more than 4 times consecutively
Song ends on dissonant interval
